review:
Bhavana ma'm is friendly and communicates in a polite, comforting and nice manner. Treats the people as per the person's condition and in an effective way. The procedures and the medication ma'm suggested are very good and she explains the things very clearly. Hears out patiently if we have anything to say. Responds very promptly whenever we have any query. Maintains very good Doctor-Patient relationship.  It's been a great experience consulting her and I suggest the treatment from her.
Thank you again, Bhavana ma'm.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. All the best on your journey of parenthood

review:
I have had a great experience with Dr. Bhavana. She has a very thorough and clear approach. My visits to her have always been very comforting. 
      She is always prompt to respond to anxious queries during pregnancy. I am grateful to have her as my doctor.  Thank you so much Dr.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. All the best for your pregnancy
